title: I-131A | Application for Carrier Documentation
description: Use this form if you are a lawful permanent resident (LPR), including an LPR with conditions, and wish to apply for a travel document (carrier documentation) that allows you to board an airline or other transportation carrier without the airline or transportation carrier being penalized.

filings.category: If you are a refugee, a person paroled as a refugee, or a lawful permanent resident who obtained such status as a refugee in the United States.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.A. on Form I-131)If you have a pending Form I-485, Application to Register Permanent Residence or Adjust Status.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.B. on Form I-131)If you have a pending Form I-589, Application for Asylum and for Withholding of Removal.Certain applicants may be eligible for a Fee Waiver. See Form I-912, Request for Fee Waiver, Instructions.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.C. on Form I-131)If you have a pending initial Form I-821, Application for Temporary Protected Status.Certain applicants may be eligible for a Fee Waiver. See Form I-912, Request for Fee Waiver, Instructions.
Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.D. on Form I-131)If you have been granted Deferred Enforced Departure.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.E. on Form I-131)If you have an approved Form I-821D, Consideration of Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.F. on Form I-131)If you have an approved Form I-914, Application for T Nonimmigrant Status, or Form I-914, Supplement A, Application for Family Member of T-1 Recipient.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.G. on Form I-131)If you have an approved Form I-918, Petition for U Nonimmigrant Status, or Form I-918, Supplement A, Petition for Qualifying Family Member of U-1 Recipient
Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.H. on Form I-131)If you are a current parolee under INA 212(d)(5).
Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.I. on Form I-131)If you have an approved Form I-817, Application for Family Unity Benefits.

Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.J. on Form I-131)If you have a pending Form I-687, Application for Status as a Temporary Resident Under Section 245A of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.K. on Form I-131)If you hold V Nonimmigrant Status.
Advance Parole Document (for individuals who are inside the United States) (Part 1. Item 5.M. on Form I-131)Other request for Advance Parole.
